data.actual_result: Discord is extremely slow and unresponsive and sometimes will lock up
data.expected_result: Discord responds immediately to the changes
data.short_description: Invite Members screen is extremely slow and unresponsive after opening the app (iPhone 6s specific)
data.steps_to_repro: - Completely close and restart Discord - Go to a server you have invite perms and tap on "Invite Members" - Attempt to edit the invite, or search members - Observe the response times of Discord
